name: Karsa
headline: The global dollar account.
description: Karsa is a global peer-to-peer marketplace for stablecoins. It enables over a billion people in emerging markets to save their local currency in dollars and protect against inflation.

founders.name: Shahryar Hasnani, Founder
founders.description: Enabling the 1B+ people in emerging markets to save in stablecoins and protect against currency instability. Previously head of BD at Ethereum infrastructure startup.

founders.name: Dale Wilson, Founder
founders.description: Enabling the 1B+ people in emerging markets to save in stablecoins and protect against currency instability. Previously protocol development lead at a layer 1 AI Blockchain.

generated_description:
Karsa is a promising fintech startup founded in 2025 and nestled in the vibrant ecosystem of New York City. With a mission to create "The global dollar account," Karsa aims to empower over a billion people in emerging markets to safeguard their wealth by converting local currencies into stablecoins‚Äîessentially allowing users a shield against inflation.

Initially launched as a peer-to-peer marketplace for stablecoins, Karsa offers users the ability to save and transact using dollar-pegged stablecoins efficiently. The startup‚Äôs approach is centered on accessibility and security, making it an attractive option for users seeking stability in unstable economic environments.

The platform is designed to be both user-friendly and functional, offering a straightforward process for buying, selling, and depositing stablecoins. Users can earn competitive interest rates through US Treasury yields, amassing an impressive 4-5% APY. The upcoming features promise to enhance the customer experience further, with services like global fund transfers and streamlined payments for freelancers, which tackle pain points such as high fees and long waiting times.

Karsa is part of the prestigious Y Combinator Batch W25, indicating its potential and the confidence investors have in its business model. With a lean team of just two employees, under the guidance of Group Partner Michael Seibel, Karsa is hitting the ground running in the evolving intersection of fintech, cryptocurrency, and emerging markets.

For anyone looking to learn more about their offerings‚Äîwhether it‚Äôs saving, spending, or transferring money globally‚Äîthey can visit their website at [GoKarsa.com](https://gokarsa.com). Here, users can easily navigate through various functionalities and get associated resources. 

In short, Karsa is not just another fintech startup; it's a glimpse into what the future of money could look like‚Äîa tool empowering individuals to manage their financial well-being in an increasingly digital economy.
